component.name: QjackCtl
component.summary: JACK Audio Connection Kit Qt GUI Interface

description.p: JACK Audio Connection Kit - Qt GUI Interface: A simple Qt application to control the JACK server. Written in C++ around the Qt4 toolkit for X11, most exclusively using Qt Designer. Provides a simple GUI dialog for setting several JACK server parameters, which are properly saved between sessions, and a way control of the status of the audio server. With time, this primordial interface has become richer by including a enhanced patchbay and connection control features.

screenshot.caption: The main window showing the application in action
